data.eml:eml: Revision of the Agrilus vittatus species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jendek, Eduard, Nakládal, Oto (2019): Revision of the Agrilus vittatus species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae). Zootaxa 4629 (1): 77-95, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4629.1.6
